<title level="1" pfs="">[Zuntishan Guard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2090)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Zuntishan Guard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2090)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 42

**Perception** +15

**Languages**
[Drooni](/Languages.aspx?ID=100)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +11, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6), [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows), [_holy water_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245), [Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56) (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +15 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 120

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
kukri +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite shortbow +17 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Warded Ground** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Stance](/Traits.aspx?ID=152)) The guard designates a 10- foot radius area within 30 feet as a protected zone. The guard's Strikes against targets in the protected zone deal an additional 2d6 precision damage.

</column>
name: Zuntishan Guard

text: Zuntishan Guard Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 24 Unspecific Lore : DC 22 Specific Lore : DC 19 Zuntishan Guard Source Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens pg. 42 Perception +15 Languages Drooni Skills Athletics +14, Diplomacy +11, Religion +13, Survival +13 Str +4 Dex +2 Con +2 Int +0 Wis +3 Cha +1 Items Chain Shirt, Composite Shortbow (20 arrows), holy water , Kukri (2) --- AC 22 Fort +14 Ref +12 Will +15 HP 120 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action kukri +17 (Agile, Finesse, Trip), Damage 1d6+8 slashing Ranged Single Action composite shortbow +17 (deadly d10, Propulsive, range increment 60 feet), Damage 1d6+4 piercing Warded Ground Single Action (Stance) The guard designates a 10- foot radius area within 30 feet as a protected zone. The guard's Strikes against targets in the protected zone deal an additional 2d6 precision damage.
